articles.description: Unacademy has announced the acquisition of TapChief, a networking platform for professionals in a deal which will allow the edtech unicorn to make its foray into a new segment of readying students for jobs. TapChief is set to join Unacademy with a valuation o…

articles.author: Staff Writer
articles.title: RailTel IPO subscribed 2.6 times on Day 1: 10 things to know - Mint
articles.description: RailTel IPO is is entirely an offer-for-sale.The government will sell 87.15 million shares, or a 27.16% stake in this issue
articles.content: The IPO of RailTel Corporation of India opened for subscription today to strong demand and the issue was oversubscribed in first few hours. The state-run company has fixed a price band of 93-94 a sha… [+2877 chars]
